description:
Why let a biting winter wind send you to the refuge hut early when you can keep your hands warm in cross-country ski gloves made for cold Canadian winters? Goatskin palms give you a solid grip on your poles, and thermal foam insulation with extra wind protection on the back of the hand protects you from cold where skiers' hands feel it most.

  • Shell is polyester mesh with 4-way stretch for full range of motion
  • Goatskin palms add durability
  • 5mm polyurethane thermal foam insulation with windblock barrier on backside keeps hands toasty
  • Polyester fleece lining is soft against the skin
  • Soft nylon cuff with Velcro® strap for a secure fit
name: Auclair Skater Nordic Gloves - Women's
